column1: Ramchandra Murarilal Bhattad &  vs State of Maharashtra & Ors on 5 December, 2006
" Although the scope of judicial review or the development of law in this field has been
noticed  hereinbefore  particularly  in  the  light  of  the  decision  of  this  Court  in  ABL
International  Ltd.  (supra),  each  case,  however,  must  be  decided  on  its  own  facts.
Public interest as noticed hereinbefore, may be one of the factors to exercise power
of judicial review. In a case where a public law element is involved, judicial review may
